title: AMAZING LOCATION | NEW RENOVATION | QUARTZ COUNTERS | ATTACHED GARAGE
posting_body: Large two bedroom available featuring stainless appliance package, custom cabinets, quartz countertops, built-in bookshelves and desks, spacious walk-in closets, attached garage!
Cardio fitness center, sparkling swimming pool, grilling stations and expansive bark park!
Conveniently located in North ATX, just mins from some of the best local attractions, shopping, dining and parks in town.
